text: 14:18 Ua Me Ini 20:5-6; 34:6-7; Godɨn Araziba 5:9-10; 7:9-10‘Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ zuamɨra anɨngazir puvatɨ. Kɨ zurara gumazamizibar apangkuva, egha zurara uan mɨgɨrɨgɨabar gɨn ghua guizɨn arazibagh ami. Kɨ men arazir kuraba ko arazir akaba batoziba ko, igharagha garir bizir kurar avɨriba gɨn amadi. Egha kɨ garima, arazir kurabagh amir gumaziba, me osɨmtɨziba itima, kɨ ivezir kuram me ganɨdi. Egh men boribar borir gɨn otivamiba, kɨ ivezir kuram me danɨng mangɨtɨ men igiav otaribar boriba otivigham.’
